name: qop 2
summary:
qop 2 is a minimalistic puzzle which goal is to get the cube to finish using 4 directions in space. The difficulty increases due to the unique cubes - angular, teleports and lock cubes.

- FullHD
- 60 levels
- Smooth animation
- Pleasant music
- Intuitive interface
- Night mode
- Steam achievements
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发商: Quiet River
  • 发行: Quiet River
  • 游戏类型: puzzle
  • 游戏引擎: Clickteam Fusion 2.5
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2017-12-12
  • 售价: ¥6
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/757330/qop_2/
